blurb: A decentralized platform to let anyone run a 24/7/365 TV-like network with signed manifests and swarm delivery.
description: ISVN enables creators to operate continuous channels or VOD catalogs. Publishers ingest live or file sources, transcode to multiple renditions, chunk and sign segments, and announce via a DHT. Viewers fetch via peer swarms (WebRTC/QUIC) with HTTP/CDN fallback. Channel manifests encode identity, schedules, renditions, and optional monetization. This page provides a dependency-free HTML5 demo player.
